attributes.action: restrict the amount of homework for all children age 4-18 to a maximum of 2 hours per week.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many children have far too much homework to keep up with. In PSHE lessons, children are taught to expand their social skills. How are they to do this if they have no time for a social life? This increasing amount of homework also causes a lot of stress for students. Teachers are being paid to teach students during school hours. They should have a duty to teach effectively so that seemingly endless homework is unnecessary.
